languages.text: {n}Космический волк разражается неприятным смехом.{/n} "Хотел бы я на такое посмотреть... Ладно, я чую, куда ты ведешь. Никто не упрекнет Торбальда Железношкурого в том, что он не чтит хозяев дома, в который прибыл гостем. Довольно споров, я умолкну и буду убивать еретиков таким манером, как решит почтенный железный жрец".

{n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."
languages.original_text: {n}Космический волк разражается неприятным смехом.{/n} "Хотел бы я на такое посмотреть... Ладно, я чую, куда ты ведешь. Никто не упрекнет Торбальда Железношкурого в том, что он не чтит хозяев дома, в который прибыл гостем. Довольно споров, я умолкну и буду убивать еретиков таким манером, как решит почтенный железный жрец".

languages.text: {n}索巴德发出了不快的笑声。{/n}“我倒是想看看他有没有这个胆子……好吧，我听你的，我可不想让别人指责索巴德·铁皮来别人的地方做客，却不尊重当地的主人。我不会再与你争辩了，我会保持沉默。无论我们尊敬的齿轮神甫打算怎么消灭那群异端分子，我都愿意配合。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德发出了不快的笑声。{/n}“我倒是想看看他有没有这个胆子……好吧，我听你的，我可不想让别人指责索巴德·铁皮来别人的地方做客，却不尊重当地的主人。我不会再与你争辩了，我会保持沉默。无论我们尊敬的齿轮祭司打算怎么消灭那群异端分子，我都愿意配合。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Le Space Wolf éclate d'un rire désagréable.{/n} « Qu'il essaie un peu, pour voir... Bon, j'ai compris. On n'accusera pas Thorbald Peau-de-Fer de manquer de respect aux maîtres d'une maison où il n'est qu'un invité. Vous n'entendrez plus aucune objection de ma part, je garderai le silence. Je tuerai les hérétiques de la façon choisie par le vénérable technoprêtre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Space Wolf éclate d'un rire désagréable.{/n} « Qu'il essaie un peu, pour voir... Bon, j'ai compris. On n'accusera pas Thorbald Peau-de-Fer de manquer de respect aux maîtres d'une maison où il n'est qu'un invité. Vous n'entendrez plus aucune objection de ma part, je garderai le silence. Je tuerai les hérétiques de la façon choisie par le vénérable technoprêtre. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}スペースウルフは不愉快そうに笑う。{/n}「やってみろと言いたいところだが…大人しく聞こう。トールバルド・アイアンハイドは客としてやってきた屋敷の主人たちに無礼な真似はしない。これ以上俺から何も言うことはない。尊敬する歯車の司祭が選んだ方法で異端者を殺そう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."

traits.locale_text: {n}スペースウルフは不愉快そうに笑う。{/n}「やってみろと言いたいところだが…大人しく聞こう。トールバルド・アイアンハイドは客としてやってきた屋敷の主人たちに無礼な真似はしない。これ以上俺から何も言うことはない。尊敬する歯車の司祭が選んだ方法で異端者を殺そう」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}El Lobo Espacial estalla en una risa poco desagradable.{/n} «Que lo intente si quiere... De acuerdo, {mf|le|la} escucho. Nadie acusará a Thorbald Piel de Hierro de faltarles al respeto a sus anfitriones. De mí no saldrá ni una queja más; solo silencio. Mataré a los herejes como designe el admirable engranasacerdote».
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo Espacial estalla en una risa poco desagradable.{/n} «Que lo intente si quiere... De acuerdo, {mf|le|la} escucho. Nadie acusará a Thorbald Piel de Hierro de faltarles al respeto a sus anfitriones. De mí no saldrá ni una queja más; solo silencio. Mataré a los herejes como designe el admirable engranasacerdote».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Der Space Wolf bellt ein unangenehmes Lachen.{/n} "Das soll er ruhig mal versuchen ... Schön, ich habe verstanden. Niemand soll Thorbald Eisenhaut vorwerfen können, die Herren des Hauses nicht zu respektieren, in das er als Gast gekommen ist. Ihr werdet von mir keinen Widerspruch mehr hören, nur Schweigen. Ich werde die Ketzer auf die Weise töten, die vom verehrten Zahnrad-Priester vorgeschlagen wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Uzay Kurdu; kulak tırmalayan, ulumayla karışık bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Bunu denediğini görmek için para verirdim... Ancak ne demek istediğini anladım. Kimse Thorbald Demirpost'u misafir gittiği yerde ev sahibine saygısızlıkla itham edemez. Bundan sonra itiraz etmeyeceğim, kararları sükûnla karşılayacağım. Kâfirleri, saygıdeğer dişli rahibin belirlediği usulle öldüreceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Wolf bellows with unpleasant laughter.{/n} "I would like to see him try... Fine, I hear you. No one will accuse Thorbald Ironhide of disrespecting the masters of the house where he arrived as a guest. You will hear no more arguing from me — only silence. I will kill the heretics in the manner chosen by the esteemed cog-priest."
